trans-unit.source: Indicates which <xref uid="langword_csharp_IDispatch" name="IDispatch" href=""></xref> implementation the common language runtime uses when exposing dual interfaces and dispinterfaces to COM.
trans-unit.target: 指出哪些<xref uid="langword_csharp_IDispatch" name="IDispatch" href=""></xref>實作公開雙重介面和 com 的分配介面時，會使用 common language runtime

trans-unit.source: You can apply this attribute to classes or assemblies.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此屬性套用至類別或組件。

trans-unit.source: This attribute should only be set when an explicit implementation is required.
trans-unit.target: 需要明確的實作時，應該只能設定此屬性。

trans-unit.source: When you set the attribute to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>, the `IDispatch` implementation is supplied by passing the type information for the object to COM's `CreateStdDispatch` API.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性設定為<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>、`IDispatch`實作提供將物件的類型資訊傳遞至 COM 的`CreateStdDispatch`API。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>

trans-unit.source: When you set the attribute to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>, the `IDispatch` implementation is supplied by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 當您將屬性設定為<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>、`IDispatch`實作由 common language runtime 所提供。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>

trans-unit.source: Setting the attribute to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType> allows the runtime to choose the appropriate implementation.
trans-unit.target: 將屬性設定為<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>可讓執行階段選擇適當的實作。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>

trans-unit.source: When using the attribute on an assembly, the attribute applies to all classes defined within the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 當組件上使用屬性，屬性會套用至組件中定義的所有類別。

trans-unit.source: When using the attribute on an individual class, the attribute applies only to the interfaces exposed by that class and overrides any assembly-level setting.
trans-unit.target: 當使用個別的類別上的屬性，屬性只適用於該類別所公開的介面，而且會覆寫任何組件層級設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IDispatchImplAttribute" name="IDispatchImplAttribute" href=""></xref> class with specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_IDispatchImplAttribute" name="IDispatchImplAttribute" href=""></xref>類別指定<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor takes an underlying 16-bit signed integer that represents each <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType> enumeration member.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式接受基礎的 16 位元帶正負號的整數，表示每個<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>列舉成員。</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType>

trans-unit.source: The Type Library Importer (TlbImp.exe) uses this constructor to avoid generating a typeref to the `IDispatchImplType` value that `value` represents, and then builds the signature with that token.
trans-unit.target: 類型程式庫匯入工具 (TlbImp.exe) 使用這個建構函式，以避免產生要 typeref`IDispatchImplType`值`value`代表，並建立具有該權杖的簽章。

trans-unit.source: Indicates which <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref> enumeration will be used.
trans-unit.target: 指出哪些<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref>將用於列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IDispatchImplAttribute" name="IDispatchImplAttribute" href=""></xref> class with specified <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref uid="langword_csharp_IDispatchImplAttribute" name="IDispatchImplAttribute" href=""></xref>類別指定<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: For readable code that is less prone to error, always use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 可讀取的程式碼較不容易出錯，一律使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates which <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref> enumeration will be used.
trans-unit.target: 指出哪些<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref>將用於列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref> value used by the class.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.IDispatchImplType"></xref> value used by the class.
